title: The New baby
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Breast feeding
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Infants - Care and hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Infants - Nutrition
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sibling rivalry
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Brothers and sisters
description: The daily care of a new baby; breast and bottle feeding; causes of crying between feeds; sleep and coverings; vitamins and orange juice; bathing and suitable types of clothes; the importance of care and affection at all times and of helping the other children in the family adjust to the new arrival.
